content:
@Wesley Wiser noticed one small thing in the last example in the blog post shall it not be crox --dir profiles
and you do not have to mkdir the profiles before the build
Would you like to submit a patch? I can take care of it otherwise :)
I let you do it going to bed soon
:thumbs_up: thanks for catching that
also the "without a file extension" is not that important even if you get the extention the tools will work finds it handy when auto completing filenames :)
but thinks it looks better in the blog then random selecting one of the files :)
Yeah, I think I'm going to leave that bit in since it still works and it's good that it works even with the file extension too
also sad that the https://doc.rust-lang.org/unstable-book/compiler-flags/self-profile.html link do not work. yet?
It just got merged this morning so I think it will go live when the next nightly is published. Not sure when that is....
